Package primitives

Class NormalizedVector

java.lang.Object
primitives.Triple
primitives.VectorBase
primitives.Vector
primitives.NormalizedVector
public class NormalizedVector
extends Vector
This class represents a special kind of Vector whose length is one.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static NormalizedVector I
    The I unit vector
    static NormalizedVector J
    The J unit vector
    static NormalizedVector K
    The K unit vector

    Fields inherited from class primitives.Triple

    x, y, z

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    NormalizedVector​(double x, double y, double z)
    This constructor accepts 3 doubles and returns the appropriate Vector.
    NormalizedVector​(Vector vector)
    Constructs a NormalizedVector from a not necessarily normalized Vector

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    double length()
    Gets the length of the vector.
    NormalizedVector normalized()
    Creates a new Vector with the same direction as this one but with a magnitude of one.
    NormalizedVector reversed()
    Calculates a new NormalizedVector with the opposite direction to this vector.
    double squareLength()
    Gets the length of the vector squared.

  • Constructor Details

    • NormalizedVector

      public NormalizedVector​(Vector vector)
      Constructs a NormalizedVector from a not necessarily normalized Vector
      Parameters:
      vector - The unnormalized vector.

    • NormalizedVector

      public NormalizedVector​(double x, double y, double z)
      This constructor accepts 3 doubles and returns the appropriate Vector.
      Parameters:
      x - The value of the x coordinate.
      y - The value of the y coordinate.
      z - The value of the z coordinate.
      Throws:
      ZeroVectorException - if the x, y, and z are all zero.

  • Method Details

    • normalized

      public NormalizedVector normalized()
      Description copied from class: Vector
      Creates a new Vector with the same direction as this one but with a magnitude of one.
      Overrides:
      normalized in class Vector
      Returns:
      new Vector

    • reversed

      public NormalizedVector reversed()
      Calculates a new NormalizedVector with the opposite direction to this vector.
      Overrides:
      reversed in class Vector
      Returns:
      Since the magnitude is unchanged, the returned Vector is a NormalizedVector.

    • length

      public double length()
      Gets the length of the vector.
      Overrides:
      length in class VectorBase
      Returns:
      1.0 since a normalized vector by definition has a length of one.

    • squareLength

      public double squareLength()
      Gets the length of the vector squared.
      Overrides:
      squareLength in class VectorBase
      Returns:
      1.0 since a normalized vector by definition has a length of one.
